name: Shadowdasher
description:
Ambient. Dark. Creepy. Dash your way to freedom!

Originally developed by two newbies for the GMTK Game Jam 2019 with the theme "only one", this tiny game features only one level and one basic "skill", the dash. 
With the addition of a stopwatch, racing to the end in about 30 seconds or less proves to be somewhat difficult but also very fun (at least for us!). 

We hope you enjoy!
